title: Sports Alerts - MLB edition
summary: LIVE, FAST scores, stats and alerts for MLB
description: Get LIVE, FAST scores, stats and alerts for the MLB on your phone, tablet and our new Android Wear app!All your received alerts are saved in your alert history in case you missed any.Get standard game alerts and player alerts you won't find anywhere else, all easily configurable.We use real push technology with no background services running for faster alerts with no wasted bandwidth and battery life.We also provide:● live scores widget, updated every minute● custom notification cards for Android Wear● live play by play● full team rosters● team schedules● season stats for every player● team news from multiple outlets● post-game highlights and other YouTube videosThe following alert types are available: ● game start ● game end ● score change● lead change ● extra inning game ● no hitter through 7● no hitter● 1 hit from cycle● hit for cycle● 4 hits● 3 homeruns● 4 RBI● 5 RBI● 3 stolen bases● 12 strikeouts● close game (within 2 runs or tying run on deck in 9th)● starting lineups posted** note: This app is not affiliated with or endorsed by Major League Baseball. Any trademarks used in the app are done so under "fair use" with the sole purpose of identifying the respective entities, and remain the property of their respective owners.
descriptionHTML:
Get LIVE, FAST scores, stats and alerts for the MLB on your phone, tablet and our new Android Wear app!

All your received alerts are saved in your alert history in case you missed any.

Get standard game alerts and player alerts you won't find anywhere else, all easily configurable.

We use real push technology with no background services running for faster alerts with no wasted bandwidth and battery life.

We also provide:
● live scores widget, updated every minute
● custom notification cards for Android Wear
● live play by play
● full team rosters
● team schedules
● season stats for every player
● team news from multiple outlets
● post-game highlights and other YouTube videos

The following alert types are available:

● game start
● game end
● score change
● lead change
● extra inning game
● no hitter through 7
● no hitter
● 1 hit from cycle
● hit for cycle
● 4 hits
● 3 homeruns
● 4 RBI
● 5 RBI
● 3 stolen bases
● 12 strikeouts
● close game (within 2 runs or tying run on deck in 9th)
● starting lineups posted

** note: This app is not affiliated with or endorsed by Major League Baseball. Any trademarks used in the app are done so under "fair use" with the sole purpose of identifying the respective entities, and remain the property of their respective owners.
comments: Its a great way to see scores and news

The last update does nothing to improve this app, was better before. I have always liked this app and use it daily, dropped 1 to 2 stars because of that last update, hope they rethink this recent change for the worse.
1. Design was better before the new 'modern' update. 2. There is still a bug with the pitchers' stats: the box scores fail to record when a pitcher gives up a home run. There is no excuse for this!
Really nice easy to use MLB app for schedules scores standings & news through out the season as well as news during off season news! Very easy to use & I really like to new layout & latest update !
This us a really good source for quick access to scores and other information.  I was happier with the GAMES screen before the update, but like that it shows the team's W/L stats right up front.
The update hasn't really changed much and it did take a while to get used to but I have had no issues with alerts or game info since so overall still a good app!
